extendedInfo.description: 3D City Fireworks is a Live Wallpaper within a Spinning cube. You could play with the cube with hand swipe. The Pictures chosen are from New Year Celebration around the world during New Years days in the famous cities. It is an amazing light show and we enhance the visual effect with lighting effects shinning at the rotating cube. Features Include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.
